name: Puzzle Rush (SoundWall)
description:
Puzzle Rush is a jigsaw puzzle game which allows you to setup your own challenge. You can:

  • Choose the number of puzzle pieces as you want (8, 16, 32, 64, 128 pieces)!
  • Set any image to be used as a jigsaw puzzle image; or use one of 6 built-in puzzle images!
  • Track your best times for each puzzle parts - puzzle image setup!

Puzzle Rush works on Windows platform. Simply download .zip (and extract contents to anywhere)  or .exe (and install game to anywhere) version to play the game!
